short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a live calculator on the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy access: CMD+I or CTRL+I (can be overridden).

* Get results as you type
* Use natural language (50k + 15%)
* Unit conversions, programming, scientific commands, and more
* Share calcs with 1-click
* Works offline
* Sync with your Google account
